title: Most played game, still can't make a reliable client
body: Start a ranked game game. All champions locked in game starts to load up aaaaaaaaaaand crashes. Reload game. WAIT A MINUTE LETS SCAN 13000 FILES FIRST. Finally figured out why so many people don't connect in ranked games. Gotta scan dem files, you know, the ones I just patched.

replies.body:
>Gotta scan dem files, you know, the ones I just patched.

ikr

I hate it. And if your download is interupted halfway, then you have to start the download from the very beginning, as the files you've already downloaded are instantly deleted. For a time and age where most technologies are expected to continue from where they left off when you shut them down, it's really just a bummer.
